document.full_text: james neal scored in the third round of a shootout as pittsburgh moved 2 points behind philadelphia in the race for the atlantic division and eastern conference leads.
document.title: n.h.l. roundup: penguins edge devils in shootout, closing gap in the east race
lines_and_colors: james neal scored in the third round of a shootout as pittsburgh moved 2 points behind philadelphia in the race for the atlantic division and eastern conference leads.
